轊字的基本解释

轊
wèi
车轴头，即套在车轴末端的金属筒状物：“车挂轊，人驾肩。”

轊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wèi］
［《廣韻》于歲切，去祭，云。］
［《廣韻》祥歲切，去祭，邪。］
(1)车轴头。
(2)碾压；践踏。
(3)通“槥”。小棺。

轊字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　轊； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1248第18
同軎。俗作䡺。譌作?。音義?同。

轊字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体旧字形
轊字的起名意思

暂无。

Qi
Basic explanation of words
Qi
wèi
Axle head, that is, a metal tube at the end of the axle: "The car hangs on the wheel, and the person rides on the shoulder."
Qi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wèi］
["Guangyun" cuts at every year, to sacrifice, cloud. ]
["Guang Yun" Cheung Sui cut, go to sacrifice, evil. ]
(1) Axle head.
(2) Crushing; trampling.
(3) Through "槥". Small coffin.
Qi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Car Character Department] 　轊; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1248 Page 18
The same 軎. Popular as you. Xiao Zuo?. Sound and meaning? Same.
